name: CowBoy Boy
description:
CowBoy Boy

This game was created for Wrench Jam

CowBoy Boy is a fast paced, platforming, experimental, local multiplayer shooter featuring some cowboy boys!

PC CONTROLS

Space - Shoot

WASD - Player1 movement and jump

IJKL - Players2 movement and jump

ARROW KEYS - Player3 movement and jump

XBOX CONTROLLER CONTROLS

Y - Jump

A - Shoot

Left stick - Player movement and jump

Credits:

Bryan "Bman" Adams - programmer and artist

Chris - programmer

Alan - artist

Arran - sound boi

Kevin - sound boi
